page.title: 15LEISURE - SNOOKER
page.content: IN MY LEISURE TIME I PLAY SNOOKER.SNOOKER IS A GAMEWITH A RECTANGULAR-SHAPED TABLE,COVERED IN GREEN BAIZE, WITH 6 HOLES;ONE IN EACH CORNER AND 2 AT THE SIDES, IN THE MIDDLE.THESE HOLES ARE CALLED POCKETS. ON A FULL SIZE TABLE 12' X 6' THERE ARE 15 RED BALLS (1 POINT) AND 1 EACH OF THESE : YELLOW (2 POINTS),GREEN (3 POINTS),BROWN (4 POINTS), BLUE (5 POINTS)PINK (6 POINTS),BLACK (7 POINTS). EACH PLAYER HAS A LONG SHAFT OF WOOD WITH A TIP ON THE TOP. THE IDEA OF THE GAME IS TO HIT THE WHITE BALL AND POT ONE OF THE REDS,WHICH ARE SET OUT IN A TRIANGLE AT THE START.THE PLAYER MUST POT ANY COLOUR THEN ANOTHER RED. THIS GOES ON UNTIL ALL THE REDS ARE POTTED.PLAYER THEN PLAYS YELLOW,GREEN,BROWN,BLUE,PINK AND FINALLY BLACK.
